_header: Say sinful man what is thine thought
_description: A warning to the worldly man — one quatrain

BLHar2316.Transcription: Sey sinful man what is þyn thowhtþat to þis werd art al youenHeþen schat þow beren riht nowhtÞow cristendom al were þyn owen
BLHar2316.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.120-1.
